name: RetrievePurchaseOrders
description:
Retrieve purchase orders from Xero.

Use this tool to obtain purchase orders from Xero. Call when you need a list of purchase orders with details such as order status, dates, and amounts.

parameters.name: xero_tenant_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Xero tenant to access specific organization's data.

parameters.name: filter_by_status
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by status. Accepted values are: 'DRAFT', 'SUBMITTED', 'AUTHORISED', 'BILLED', 'DELETED'.

parameters.name: filter_by_start_date
parameters.description: Specify the start date for filtering purchase orders. Use format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

value_schema.description: Filter by purchase order date (e.g. GET https://.../PurchaseOrders?DateFrom=2015-12-01&DateTo=2015-12-31

parameters.name: filter_by_end_date
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by end date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: Filter by purchase order date (e.g. GET https://.../PurchaseOrders?DateFrom=2015-12-01&DateTo=2015-12-31

parameters.name: order_by_element
parameters.description: Specifies the element by which to sort the purchase orders, such as date or status. Accepts any valid field name.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Specifies the page of results to retrieve. Increment to access subsequent pages of purchase orders.

value_schema.description: To specify a page, append the page parameter to the URL e.g. ?page=1. If there are 100 records in the response you will need to check if there is any more data by fetching the next page e.g ?page=2 and continuing this process until no more results are returned.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of purchase order records to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: Number of records to retrieve per page

parameters.name: modified_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp to filter records created or modified since this time. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z').

value_schema.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned
